summary.para: The module contained in the DevExpress.ExpressApp.StateMachine.v12.1.dll assembly.
Creates an instance of the StateMachineModule class.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.StateMachine.StateMachineModule.RegisterDomainComponentEntities(DevExpress.ExpressApp.DC.ITypesInfo,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)

summary.para: Registers the domain component entities that are required by the State Machine module.

member.param: An ITypesInfo object that is the type information store within which the domain components required for the State Machine module must be registered.
A string that specifies the name for the State Machine entity.
A string that specifies the name for the State entity.
A string that specifies the name for the Transition entity.
A string that specifies the name for the State Appearance entity.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.StateMachine.StateMachineModule.Setup(DevExpress.ExpressApp.XafApplication)

summary.para: Sets up the StateMachineModule after it has been added to the collection.

member.param: An object that provides methods and properties to manage the current application. This parameter value is set for the property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.StateMachine.StateMachineModule.StateMachineRepository

summary.para: Specifies a state machine repository used by the StateMachineModule.

member.value: An IStateMachineRepository object used by the StateMachineModule to retrieve state machines associated with business objects of a particular type.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.StateMachine.StateMachineModule.StateMachineStorageType

summary.para: Specifies a persistent type used to store state machines in the database.

member.value: A persistent type used to store state machines in the database.
